title: McLaren the only F1 team without updates for Spanish GP
summary: McLaren is not bringing any updates to Barcelona, having already tested its more rigid front wing at Imola

qa_pairs.question: Which team is known to have not brought any updates to the Spanish Grand Prix?
What specific component did McLaren test at Imola before the Spanish GP?
In Formula 1, what is the significance of a team bringing updates to a race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It can improve car performance and competitiveness.
wrong_options: It is mandatory for all teams.
